title: The Daring
description: Known for their audacity and willingness to take risks, tackling difficult situations with confidence.

title: The Watchful
description: Observes from a distance and avoids engaging in risky actions.

title: The Mastermind
description: Exhibits exceptional mental acuity and remains unflappable under pressure, skillfully maneuvering through perilous situations.

title: The Braveheart
description: Possesses inner courage but strategically avoids risky scenarios whenever possible.

title: The Daring Tactician
description: Boldly faces risks while employing clever strategies and maintaining a level-headed demeanor.

title: The Shrewd Bystander
description: Observes and strategizes from a distance, preferring to avoid direct involvement in risky situations.
